devdoc.details: Proxy contract to read multiple ERC1400/ERC20 token balances in a single contract call.

balancesOf(address[],address[]).details: Get a batch of ERC20 token balances.

params.tokenAddresses: Addresses of tokens where the balances need to be fetched.
params.tokenHolders: Addresses for which the balance is required.

balancesOfByPartition(address[],address[.details: Get a batch of ERC1400 token balances.

params.tokenAddresses: Addresses of tokens where the balances need to be fetched.
params.tokenHolders: Addresses for which the balance is required.

totalSupplies(address[]).details: Get a batch of ERC20 token total supplies.

params.tokenAddresses: Addresses of tokens where the balances need to be fetched.

totalSuppliesByPartition(bytes32[],addre.details: Get a batch of ERC1400 token total supplies by partitions.

params.tokenAddresses: Addresses of tokens where the balances need to be fetched.
